
============
Introduction
============

``led`` is a Docker utility for Lets Encrypt


Objectives
----------


Installing
----------

Install and update using `pip`:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -U led


A Simple Example
----------------

.. code-block:: python

   from led import App

   app = App()

   def _say(interjection='I like', noun='Pies'):
       return app.say(interjection, noun)
